info.name: Company Profile Backend API
info.description: Complete API collection for the Company Profile Backend system. This collection includes authentication, PDF management, pages, sections, attachments, and settings management.

item.name: Authentication

request.description: Register a new user account
Login user and get authentication token
Get current authenticated user information
Logout current user and invalidate token

item.description: Authentication endpoints for user registration, login, logout, and user information retrieval.

item.name: PDF Management

request.description: Retrieve all PDFs
Get the most recently created PDF
Create a new PDF document
Get a specific PDF by its ID
Update an existing PDF
Delete a PDF by its ID

item.description: PDF document management endpoints for creating, reading, updating, and deleting PDF documents.

item.name: Page Management

request.description: Get all pages, optionally filtered by PDF ID
Create a new page
Get a specific page by its ID
Update an existing page
Delete a page by its ID
Reorder pages by updating their order values

item.description: Page management endpoints for creating, reading, updating, deleting, and reordering pages within PDF documents.

item.name: Section Management

request.description: Get all sections, optionally filtered by Page ID

body.raw:
{
    "page_id": 1,
    "title": "Company Overview",
    "content": "This section contains information about our company",
    "type": "text",
    "order": 1
}

request.description: Create a new section
Get a specific section by its ID
Update an existing section
Delete a section by its ID
Reorder sections by updating their order values

item.description: Section management endpoints for creating, reading, updating, deleting, and reordering sections within pages.

item.name: Attachment Management

request.description: Get all attachments, optionally filtered by PDF ID
Upload a new attachment file
Get a specific attachment by its ID
Update an existing attachment (file upload is optional)
Delete an attachment by its ID
Download an attachment file
Reorder attachments by updating their order values

item.description: Attachment management endpoints for uploading, reading, updating, deleting, downloading, and reordering file attachments.

item.name: Settings Management

request.description: Get all application settings
Create a new setting
Get a specific setting by its ID
Update an existing setting

item.description: Settings management endpoints for creating, reading, and updating application settings.

item.name: File Management

request.description: Access public files directly (no authentication required)

item.description: Public file access endpoints for serving files from the public storage.
